name: MeningococcalDiseaseTestsForNeisseriaMeningitidisNucleicAcid
title: Meningococcal Disease (Tests for Neisseria meningitidis Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Neisseria meningitidis nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: meningitidis nucleic acid;  

LOINC search:  'Neisseria meningitidis nucleic acid -culture -isolate -panel'),(Exclusion Criteria: panel and isolate tests)
